name: ToonStream API (Bun)
author: admin@toonstream.api
description: ToonStream API - Anime scraping API built with Bun.js and Hono framework

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# ToonStream API Installation Script

apt update
apt install -y git curl unzip

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Clone repository
if [ -z "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
    echo "Cloning from default repository..."
    git clone https://github.com/ryanwtf88/toonstream-api.git .
else
    echo "Cloning from ${GIT_ADDRESS}..."
    git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
fi

# Install dependencies
echo "Installing dependencies with Bun..."
bun install

echo "Installation complete!"

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: The port the API will listen on

variables.name: Git Repository
variables.description: Git repository URL (leave empty for default)
